attributes.review: Absolute trash, in fact an app about trash would get a better review from me.
attributes.title: I’ve never been so disrespected in my life.

attributes.review: Do not download this app it gave me a virus on all my apple devices my friend got her phone hacked by this app and  this all had given me severe anxiety I want it off the App Store NOW!!!🤮🤮🤢🤢

0/5🤢🤮🤕😷🥴

attributes.title: Sad day Amerikkka

attributes.review: What if it steals our data? I also don’t believe it will work on my phone as my phone is allergic to fascism🤷‍♂️

attributes.review: I tried, I did, but um, I can’t even begin to tell you how hard it is to support an orange balding guy when the orange balding guy won’t support the majority of America so....

attributes.review: This app just kept screaming racial slurs at me even threatened to “grab me by the p**sy”. Now I know trump has a history with underage girls but come on now, ugh. Overall hated this app just terrible never get it
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: Roll up to the party with my crazy pink wig! But I can’t get through the door BECAUSE my booty too big!!!😠 one percent is human, 99 is plastic, hold on just gotta fix my wig!!🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Very bad app

attributes.review: The app was just garbage, it made my phone really slow and took forever to load

attributes.review: Does not deliver on promises. Spews nonsensical messages constantly, I think it has lost its mind. Bloated. Does nothing to stop viruses and may have even infected my phone.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: This app is horrible! It took 3 business days to download and when I got on it it glitches like crazy. I’m absolutely appalled. :(
